sl colors increase - increase red heart made with love papaya decrease - decrease red heart made with love iced aqua back loop only - blo i love this yarn sport weight sun yellow repeat - ** technical notes 1 this pattern is worked in continuous rounds use a stitch marker to mark the beginning of the rounds 2 written in us terms 3 poly-fil beads added to body to give weight optional 4 mattress stitch used to attach the ears body bottom mc mc round 1 6sc round 1 6sc round 2 6inc 12 round 2 6inc 12 round 3 *single_crochet increase* 18 round 3 *single_crochet increase* 18 round 4 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* 24 round 4 *single_crochet increase single_crochet* 24 round 5 *3sc increase* 30 round 5 *3sc increase* 30 round 6 *2sc increase 2sc* 36 round 6 *2sc increase 2sc* 36 round 7-14 single_crochet around leave tail to attach to body round 15 *increase 3sc* 45 round 16 *3inc 2sc* 72 round 17 single_crochet *5inc 3sc* 118 leave tail to weave in ears make 2 mc round 1 6sc round 2-4 single_crochet around leave tail to attach to head assembly 1 mattress stitch on ears 2 add eyes 3 sew on bottom halfway stuff and finish sewing up c 2 75mm hook with sport weight yarn f 3 75mm hook with worsted weight yarn dumbo octopus is all done i hope you enjoyed crocheting it and found the pattern helpful i would love to see your finished amigurumi so share a picture on social media with me by tagging me @pettypatterns once again if you have any questions don t hesitate to reach out to me through email at pettypatterns@gmail com happy crocheting ♥
